name: Drone City Racing PRO - Full VR Simulator Version
name_original: Drone City Racing PRO - Full VR Simulator Version
description:
** THIS VERSIO HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for an extreme drone racing game where you get to control a remote drone as you try to navigate a busy city street! As you fly through the city streets, you'll come across a variety of obstacles such as cars, walls, and a lot more!!

FEATURES

- Multiple drones to choose from.
- Easy controls.
- Awesome 3D graphics!
